testcase.classname: Amazon create account page should have verification on all the fields
testcase.name: All of the fields should display an error when not populated on form submission #1
testcase.system-out: Scenario Outline: All of the fields should display an error when not populated on form submission [90m# src/test/Features/CucumberFile.feature:15[0m [33mGiven [0m[33mI am on the site homepage[0m [36mWhen [0m[36mI click on "sign in link" on the "Home" Page[0m [36mAnd [0m[36mI click on "register" on the "Sign In" Page[0m [36mAnd [0m[36mI enter "tesT@test.com" into all the fields on the page[0m [36mAnd [0m[36mI clear the "name" field on the Create Account Page[0m [36mAnd [0m[36mI click on "submit" on the "Create Account" Page[0m [36mThen [0m[36mthe "missing_name_error" on the "create Account" Page should be "visible"[0m
